general.no-data: Error while loading data. Please refresh the page or try again later.

about.text1: The main goal of this project is to enable the search of products prices in commerce websites and store them for future comparison and analysis.
about.text2: Products data is automatically collected, this may result in data errors and inconsistencies. If you find any, please send an email.
about.text3: This project is non commercial and is not affiliated with any company or organization. It is open-source and can be used by anyone.

privacy-terms.text1: This website don't collect, store or use any personal data.
privacy-terms.text2: It doesn't use cookies or any other tracking technologies.
privacy-terms.delete-local-data-text: This will delete all the data stored locally on your device, including products lists. This action can't be undone.

product-titles.price-indicator-info: Green - Price lower than the average price. Orange - Price equal to the average price. Red - Price higher than the average price.
